title: A Day in the Life of a Farmer  Hard Work Pure Joy

subtasks: Hold baker's bag with both hands
Pour contents into mixing bowl
Use spatula to mix ingredients
Place dough onto baking tray
Bake in preheated oven

tasks.task: Opening and closing a harina bag
subtasks: Lift harina bag by carrying handle
Hug bag tightly to secure opening
Extend arm forward while unzipping
Grasp zipper tab and open bag
Repeat in reverse to close bag
